de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.sift

Class SiftWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.sift.SiftWrapper

  • public class SiftWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Code that Wraps the Sift Executable. SiftWrapper t = new SiftWrapper(new File("c:/temp/siftWin32.exe")); List features = t.getFeatures(new File("c:\\temp\\ant-sample.pgm")); An image passed to this class is first saved as a .pgm in the systems temp directory. This file is passed to the sift binary and deleted afterwards.
